metadata.title: Microsoft Office 2003 is installed
metadata.description: The application Microsoft Office 2003 is installed.

modified.comment: Added CPE reference.
Corrected ste:449 to use a pattern match and allow a major version of 11 and not check for other version components. Implemented by Jon Baker of the MITRE Corporation.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:ste:449 - Made updates to MS09-073 - In ste:5428 corrected the version and updated comments to test ID tst:10574 & authoring guide updates.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:418 - Corrected registry key
Added Windows Server 2008 R2 platform
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:418 - Updated registry object and corresponding state collected while checking if Microsoft Office 2003 is installed.

registry_object.comment: This registry key identifies the version of Internet Explorer
registry_object.name: Version

registry_object.comment: The registry key that identifies the location of the common files directory.
registry_object.name: CommonFilesDir

registry_object.comment: Registry key specifying where Microsoft Visual Studio 2002 is installed
registry_object.name: InstallDir

registry_object.comment: Registry key that is set when Service Pack 1 for Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2002
registry_object.name: Installed

registry_object.comment: Registry key specifying where Microsoft Visual Studio 2003 is installed
registry_object.name: InstallDir

file_object.comment: Object holds, if file wordview.exe is present

registry_object.comment: The registry key that identifies the location of the Word Viewer installed directory.
registry_object.name: Path

family_object.comment: This is the default family object. Only one family object should exist.

registry_object.comment: This registry key identifies the architecture on the system
registry_object.name: PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE

registry_object.comment: This registry key identifies the Windows ProductName
registry_object.name: ProductName

registry_object.comment: This registry key holds the service pack installed on the host if one is present.
registry_object.name: CSDVersion

registry_object.comment: Registry key that hold the current windows os version
registry_object.name: CurrentVersion

registry_state.comment: Regex that matches a string containing numbers separated by a hyphen
Regex that matches a string containing -OEM-
The registry key has a value of Service Pack 2
The registry key matches with Vista
The registry key matches with Windows XP
Regex that matches Service Pack 2 or later
Registry key has a value of 5.0
